attributes.action: take action to stop the russian govt flooding internet services to prevent the freedom of speach for the georgian people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: internet services are being compromised by eastern block countries to silence political acttervists which is wrong.by blocking these services it is also affecting people in the uk.all my foefathers fought in the wars for this country,from the zulu wars,boar wars to 1st and 2nd world wars.the govt has let eastern europe in this country through the back door..offloading all their crminals to the uk,and now you are allowing them to silence our freedom of speach.as a tax payer and natural citizen of this country i demand some action to solve this problem

rejection.details: As we can not verify your claims we are unable to accept your petition as it is written.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
